head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WALSH, BROTHER AZARIAS PETER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WALSH, BROTHER AZARIAS PETER

block.p: WALSH-Brother Azarias Peter, FSC, 83, of Lincroft, NJ on June 15, 2001. Brother of James J. and Thomas J. Walsh, Mary E. Casella, and Catherine C. Franklin. Also survived by two nephews and two nieces. The wake will be held at De La Salle Hall, 810 Newman Springs Road, Lincroft on Tuesday from 2:00-4:00 and 6:30 to 8:00 PM. The Funeral Liturgy will be celebrated at De La Salle Hall on Tuesday at 8:00 PM. The interment will be held at Calvary Cemetery, Queens, NY on Wednesday at 11:00 AM. Memorial donations to De La Salle Nursing Development, 810 Newman Springs Road, Lincroft, NJ 07738 would be appreciated. For any further information contact Higgins Memorial Home, Freehold, New Jersey.
